ValidationRule.description: In order to override/edit the ACV amount both the Override Checkbox and Override reason must be populated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(ACV__c), ACV__c <> PRIORVALUE(ACV__c), ISBLANK(ACV_Override_Reason__c), NOT(ISBLANK( SyncedQuoteId )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: ACV Override Reason required to change ACV amount when Quote is synced.
